results.content: Great course in the basics of HTML, CSS and Bootstrap 4.  The instructor really helped me to understand how to build a responsive site with the use of the OFFSET code in Bootstrap.  Very well done and totally enjoyed the coding experience.  I highly recommend this course.
results.content_html: Great course in the basics of HTML, CSS and Bootstrap 4. The instructor really helped me to understand how to build a responsive site with the use of the OFFSET code in Bootstrap. Very well done and totally enjoyed the coding experience. I highly recommend this course.

results.content: Instructor shows with overlays how the Bootstrap grid and offsets work, which really helps. The other details of making the site adapt to different screen sizes using the built-in Bootstrap classes helps realise the idea of how you do things in Bootstrap.
results.content_html: Instructor shows with overlays how the Bootstrap grid and offsets work, which really helps. The other details of making the site adapt to different screen sizes using the built-in Bootstrap classes helps realise the idea of how you do things in Bootstrap.

results.content:
This course of Bootstrap responsive Landing page has helped in my job Interview. 
I highly recommend for beginners to complete both the 2 courses provided by the Instructor.
Because at Front end you can 't think of coding a website without having a knowledge of Bootstrap 's grid system.

I also request instructor to please bring more such free courses that would help beginners to enhance their coding skills.
